title: Thousands gather for a vigil at Bondi Beach
description: A sunset vigil at Bondi Beach has marked one week since the terrorist attack, with up to 15,000 people gathering to hold prayers, a minute's silence at the exact moment the attack began, and to commemorate the last night of Hanukkah with the theme 'light over darkness'. #Bondi #BondiBeach #Bondivigil #Bondiattack

title: Bondi hero Ahmed Al Ahmed thanked by the victim's family
description: Bondi hero Ahmed Al Ahmed received a hospital visit from a prominent Muslim community leader and two rabbis, including Rabbi Mendel Kastel, the brother-in-law of shooting victim Eli Schlanger. #Bondi #BondiBeach #Bondihero #Bondiattack

title: NSW Government recalled to discuss fast tracking gun reform
description: Premier Chris Minns has recalled NSW Parliament to introduce sweeping changes to the state's gun reform laws. #gunreform #gunlaws #nswgovernment #parliament #bondi

title: Tensions flare at Bondi vigil for terror victims | 7NEWS
description: A community vigil at Bondi Beach drew approximately 20,000 people to honour victims of the Bondi terror attack, with heightened tensions as protesters confronted the Prime Minister upon his arrival. NSW Premier Chris Minns received a standing ovation and apologised to the Jewish community, while organisers declined the Prime Minister's offer to speak. The Light Through the Darkness festival featured emotional tributes, including a rendition of Waltzing Matilda, with floral tributes being collected for an art installation and potential permanent memorial. title: Trump administration removes documents from Epstein files | 7NEWS
description: The Trump administration faces controversy after the Justice Department removed 16 documents, including two photographs of President Trump, from the already published Epstein files. The release of over 300,000 documents tied to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein has revealed images of numerous famous figures including Michael Jackson, Diana Ross, Mick Jagger and former President Bill Clinton. The release has sparked bipartisan calls for transparency, though many documents remain heavily redacted and questions persist about the extent of Epstein's crimes and potential enablers. title: Barnaby Joyce attends anti-immigration rally held in Sydney
description: A small group has defied orders, holding an anti-immigration protest in Surry Hills. One Nation MP Barnaby Joyce attended, and defended, the rally. #rally #protest #barnabyjoyce #surryhills #sydney

title: Multiple killed in South Africa mass shooting
description: Nine people have been killed, and 10 others wounded, after gunmen opened fire at a bar in a township 40km southwest of Johannesburg in South Africa. #southafrica #johannesburg #police #crime #worldnews

title: Anthony Albanese booed at Bondi vigil
description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has been booed whilst attending Sunday's memorial service to remember the 15 innocent people killed during the Bondi terror attack. #albo #anthonyalbanese #primeminister #bondimemorial #bondi

title: Thousands sit an exam on airstrip in India
description: An exam for people wanting to become Home Guards in India has been held on an airstrip in Odisha state to accommodate the thousands of applicants. #india #homeguard #exam #examination #airstrip

title: Armed police to patrol MCG Boxing Day test | 7NEWS
description: Victoria Police will deploy specialist officers armed with semi-automatic rifles at the MCG for the Boxing Day test. The high visibility security operation represents an escalation of protective measures at the cricket grounds. The enhanced security is described as an additional safeguard for the community. title: Aussies urged to get vaccinated as K variant of H3N2 influenza strain spikes over summer
description: Australians are being urged to get vaccinated as the K variant of the H3N2 influenza strain spikes over summer. #flu #influenza #health #vaccine #australia

title: Disappointment over heavy redactions in declassified Epstein files
description: The highly anticipated release of the Epstein files has left many disappointed over heavy redactions, with survivors concerned the incomplete information lacking context will fuel conspiracy theories. #jeffreyepstein #epsteinfiles #doj #classified #documents

title: $1 billion deal announced to build first homes in Bradfield City development
description: A $1 billion deal has been announced for the Bradfield City development around the new Western Sydney Airport. #bradfieldcity #westernsydney #westernsydneyairport #sydney #development

title: NSW Farmers warn of danger from feral animals if new gun laws are passed
description: NSW Farmers President Xavier Martin has warned of people being attacked by feral pigs as the state debates new gun laws in the wake of the Bondi Beach terror attack. #farmer #feralpig #bondi #sydney #nswpol
